name: Moon Shard
description: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.description: Consumes the item to permanently gain bonus attack speed and bonus base night vision. A hero can only consume the Moon Shard once per game.
notes: Does not stack with Shade Sight
Considers the Spirit Bear as heroes; clones, illusions and other creep-heroes as creeps
Cannot utilize the bonus attack speed component by design for self-illusions

abilities.name: Shade Sight
abilities.description: Grants the wielder bonus night vision.
notes: Multiple Shade Sight nighttime vision bonuses do not stack
The passive bonus has precedence over and does not stack with the consumed Moon Shard buff
Increases most heroes' nighttime vision to 400

additionalInfo: Attack speed bonus from multiple Moon Shards fully stacks. The attack speed bonus from the Consume buff fully stack with the item as well.
trivia: Prior to the July 14, 2017 Patch, Moon Shard's active ability, Consume, did not have an official name. The name was taken from the Dota 2 Wiki and officially implemented into Dota 2.

recentChanges.description: Increased Shade Sight nighttime vision bonus from 300 to 400. Increased Consume nighttime vision bonus from 150 to 200.
Increased attack speed bonus from 130 to 140.
Increased attack speed bonus from 120 to 130.
